Utility.prefix [pre]: Shows the current prefix in this server
Utility.Set_prefix [setprefix, setp, set_p, sp]: Sets the prefix used for your bot

Music.pause [stop]: Pauses or unpauses the current track
Music.set_volume [volume, vol, setv, sv]: Sets the volume of the music [between 0 and 1]

Text To Speech.voice [v]: Plays the text you typed if you're currently in a voice channel
Text To Speech.set_language [setlanguage, setl, set_l,: Sets the language used in tts commands
Text To Speech.languages_list [llist, ll]: Show a list of all the available languages for tts commands
